Well, it's time to jump start the wish list topic.

Someone mentioned the idea of a 'High Priest' character class as a 
promotion from 'cleric'.

Here's some ideas:

High Priest - still keeps the attack of healing [and mystic mace].  It 
also keeps the attack of resurrectioon,. but gets an alternate: 
reincarnation.  This new attack will allow the dead to come back as a 
different character class and allow you to summon soliders from dead 
opponents.  Another possibility for attacks is shout curses [turn into 
 stone] at opponents.
